alert.note: Alert for McMinn; Monroe (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 04 at 2:55AM CST until January 06 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM EST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of east Tennessee, including the following counties, McMinn and Monroe. * WHEN...Until 600 AM EST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 355 AM EST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Up to 1.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1.5 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Athens, Madisonville and Englewood. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
